name: Yes My Lord- King story
description:
Yes My lord is a simulation RPG game that reveals the hidden secret in the Forbben City in Ancient China. In the game, you can start an official career from the Emperial Exam, depress the rebels, trade on the Silk Road, and end up sitting on the throne in the Forbbiden City. 



Key Features: 
- Establish an alliance  Call on all your friends to forge an inviciable army. 

- Marry with Wife and concubines  Reserve an appointment with the beauty and have a romance with her.
 
- Settle a law suit  Handle the government affairs and seek the truth of the intricate case. 

- PvP at Court Dispatch your retainers to go through an expedition to wipe out all the retainers of your opponent.

 - Recruit the scholars  Recruit all the scholars and Discuss the world situations with them.

 - Outing Go out for a walk with your beloved confidant, have a look at the beautiful scenery and get rich rewards.
